Doc: A specific approval state in the workflow.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A specific approval state in the workflow.
 #/
record FpML5.recordkeeping.Approval {
  # The type of approval (e.g. "pre-clearing credit").
  type : string?

  # The current state of approval (.e.g preapproved, pending approval, etc.)
  status : string?

  # The full name or identifiying ID of the relevant approver.
  approver : string?

  # A pointer style reference to a party defined elsewhere in the document. The party referenced has approved the specified item (e.g. trade or allocation).
  approvingPartyReference : FpML5.recordkeeping.PartyReference?

  # A pointer style reference to a party defined elsewhere in the document. The party referenced was approved for the specified item (e.g. trade or allocation) by the approving party (if specified).
  approvedPartyReference : FpML5.recordkeeping.PartyReference?

  # An identifer for a specific appoval, to allow the approval to be identified and tracked.
  approvalId : string?

}

status.Doc: The current state of approval (.e.g preapproved, pending approval, etc.)
status.Name: status

approver.Doc: The full name or identifiying ID of the relevant approver.
approver.Name: approver

approvingPartyReference.Doc: A pointer style reference to a party defined elsewhere in the document. The party referenced has approved the specified item (e.g. trade or allocation).
approvingPartyReference.Name: approvingPartyReference

approvedPartyReference.Doc: A pointer style reference to a party defined elsewhere in the document. The party referenced was approved for the specified item (e.g. trade or allocation) by the approving party (if specified).
approvedPartyReference.Name: approvedPartyReference

approvalId.Doc: An identifer for a specific appoval, to allow the approval to be identified and tracked.
approvalId.Name: approvalId
